title: I was a Crips member, then became a cop — here's what I learned about gangs | Flipboard
text: Tyrone White was a member of the 65 Menlo Gangster faction of the Crips gang in South Central Los Angeles during the late '80s and '90s, witnessing police brutality and the LA riots.
